title: How easy is it to publish a book on Amazon? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s easy and for free. Just log into Amazon Kindle. You’ll need an Amazon account, which you can get for free. Once logged in, set it all up set by step. You will need a ready to publish book manuscript and a book cover, or you can use the free cover creator program for a print book cover. You set up publication, distribution, pricing and tax info, plus how to pay you. Here are three books I have published through Kindle:

Really easy. Hardest part is to meet their formatting requirements, and that isn’t difficult. They have all sorts of tools for file and cover generation. Go to Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing and follow the instructions. I’ve got three printed books and two Kindle ebooks there.
